title: Timeline
excepcion: The implementation used cannot create timelineControl controls
intervals_error: The intervals were not defined correctly

textHelp.help2: The extension is customizable, so you can switch from one viewer to another.
textHelp.help3: The timeline allows you to make spatial filters on layers based on a time attribute, or add a date to a layer and filter by it.
textHelp.help4: The information relevant to the extension and its possible parameterization is documented in
textHelp.help5: The example of use of its parameters can be checked in
